ttp_template:
<group name="router_id_local_as">
Router identifier {{ROUTER_ID}}, local AS number {{LOCAL_AS | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
cli_content:
BGP routing table information for VRF RED
Router identifier 10.1.1.1, local AS number 65001
BGP table version is 5, main routing table version 5
Status codes: s suppressed, d damped, h history, * valid, > best, i internal, S Stale, R Removed
Origin codes: i - IGP, e - EGP, ? - incomplete
Network          Next Hop            Metric LocPrf Weight Path
*> 10.1.1.0/24       192.168.1.2             0             0 65002 ?
*  10.1.2.0/24       192.168.1.3             0             0 65002 ?
*>                  192.168.1.4             0             0 65003 ?
*> 10.2.0.0/16       192.168.1.2             0             0 65002 i

BGP routing table information for VRF BLUE
Router identifier 10.2.1.1, local AS number 65002
BGP table version is 7, main routing table version 7
Status codes: s suppressed, d damped, h history, * valid, > best, i internal, S Stale, R Removed
Origin codes: i - IGP, e - EGP, ? - incomplete
Network          Next Hop            Metric LocPrf Weight Path
*> 20.1.1.0/24       192.168.2.2             0             0 65003 ?
*  20.1.2.0/24       192.168.2.3             0             0 65003 ?
*>                  192.168.2.4             0             0 65004 ?
*  20.2.0.0/16       192.168.2.5             0             0 65005 i
*>                  192.168.2.6             0             0 65006 i
textfsm_template:
Value TABLE (\S+)
Value ROUTER_ID (\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)
Value LOCAL_AS (\d+)
Value NETWORK (\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+/\d+)
Value NEXT_HOP (\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)
Value METRIC (\d+)
Value LOC_PREF (\d+)
Value WEIGHT (\d+)
Value PATH (\S+)

Start
  ^BGP routing table information for VRF\s+${TABLE} -> NextTable

NextTable
  ^Router identifier\s+${ROUTER_ID}, local AS number\s+${LOCAL_AS}
  ^BGP table version is\s+\d+, main routing table version\s+\d+
  ^Status codes:
  ^Origin codes:
  ^Network\s+Next Hop\s+Metric\s+LocPrf\s+Weight\s+Path
  ^${NETWORK}\s+${NEXT_HOP}\s+${METRIC}\s+${LOC_PREF}\s+${WEIGHT}\s+${PATH}\s*$$ -> Record
  ^\s*$$ -> Start
